title: My TLA+ Home Page
content:
My TLA+ Home Page

─┬─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┬────
 │# My TLA+ Home Page                                                      │    
 │                                                                         │    
 │Leslie Lamport                                                           │    
 │                                                                         │    
 │* Last modified on 13 October 2025 *                                     │    
 │─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┴────
 │                                                                              
 │                                                                              
 │You'll miss a lot on this web site unless you enable Javascript in your       
 │browser.                                                                      
 │I am the creator of TLA+, a high-level language for modeling programs and     
 │systems--especially concurrent and distributed ones. It's based on the idea   
 │that the best way to describe things precisely is with simple mathematics.    
 │TLA+ and its tools are useful for eliminating fundamental design errors, which
 │are hard to find and expensive to correct in code.                            
 │                                                                              
 │This web page is the home page of what used to be the TLA+ web site. TLA+ is  
 │now in the hands of the [TLA+ Foundation][1], and this is now my personal TLA+
 │web site. I have retired, and I don't know if I will make any further changes 
 │to the site other than correcting errors in it. I welcome suggestions for what
 │modifications or additions would be worth making. Instructions for contacting 
 │me are on [my home page][2]. Below are links to the top-level sections of this
 │web site.                                                                     
 │                                                                              
 │Is it TLA+ or TLA+ ?                                                          
 │                                                                              
 │## [High-Level View][3]                                                       
 │                                                                              
 │An explanation of what TLA+ is all about.                                     
 │                                                                              
 │## [News][4]                                                                  
 │                                                                              
 │Items of current interest. Last modified on 14 May 2025.                      
 │                                                                              
 │## [Industrial Use][5]                                                        
 │                                                                              
 │Some examples of how TLA+ has been used in industry.                          
 │                                                                              
 │## [Learning TLA+][6]                                                         
 │                                                                              
 │Resources for learning how to use TLA+, including an introductory video       
 │course.                                                                       
 │                                                                              
 │## [The Toolbox][7]                                                           
 │                                                                              
 │An integrated development environment (IDE) for TLA+ and its tools. There is  
 │also a [Visual Studio Code extension for TLA+][8].                            
 │                                                                              
 │## [The Tools][9]                                                             
 │                                                                              
 │Tools for checking TLA+ models. The primary ones are the TLC model checker and
 │the TLAPS proof system.                                                       
 │                                                                              
 │## [Advanced Topics][10]                                                      
 │                                                                              
 │For those who know enough about TLA+ to be able to read simple specifications.
 │                                                                              
 │## [More Stuff][11]                                                           
 │                                                                              
 │A melange of miscellaneous material mostly about TLA+ .                       
─┴──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
